alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Garfield...eastern Washington...northwestern Kane and eastern Iron Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 344 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Paragonah to 10 miles east of New Harmony. Movement was east at 30 mph. A wind gust to 45 mph was observed at I-15 near Paragonah with these storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cedar City, Enoch, Parowan, Paragonah, Cedar Breaks National Monument, Summit, Kanarraville, Brian Head and Hamilton Fort. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 46 and 99. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 53 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
